details.arabic_diacless: ربنا هب لـنا من ازواجنا وذريٰتنا قرة اعين واجعلنا للمتقين اماما‏
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبۡ لَـنَا مِنۡ اَزۡوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيّٰتِنَا قُرَّةَ اَعۡيُنٍ وَّاجۡعَلۡنَا لِلۡمُتَّقِيۡنَ اِمَامًا‏
details.transliteration: Rabbana Hablana min azwaajina wadhurriy-yatina, qurrata 'ayioni wa-jalna lil-muttaqeena Imaama
details.translations: Our Lord, grant us from among our wives and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us an example for the righteous.

pageTitle: Asking coolness of eyes from family and becoming example for the righteous [25:74]
